name: Tag
short_description: Entry point for tags (either AJAX or Nested).

properties1.name: name
properties1.description: (mandatory) is the unique name of the parameter.

properties2.name: mode
properties2.description: (mandatory) is the way the tags will be loaded, the options are ( ajax or nested )

properties3.name: label
properties3.description: (mandatory) (translatable) is the descriptive title of the field.

properties4.name: description
properties4.example: Assign tags to ###VIEW### items. Tag names must be unique.
properties4.description: (optional) (translatable) is the description of the field.

properties5.name: id
properties5.description: (optional) is the id to add to the field. Note if none is set this will be the name of the field.

properties6.name: class
properties6.description: (optional) is the class to add to the field.

properties7.name: published
properties7.description: (optional) determines if non published tags should be allowed.

properties8.name: language
properties8.description: (optional) is language to filter the existing tags by.

properties9.name: multiple
properties9.description: (optional) is the ability to add more than 1 tag to the form field.

properties10.name: custom
properties10.description: (optional) if the ajax mode is chosen setting this to [deny] will prevent users from adding in new tags.

properties11.name: showon
properties11.description: (optional) show this field on the bases of the value in another field. https://joomla.stackexchange.com/a/17682/2166

description: The tag field type provides an input for assigning tags to an item. Tags can be selected or created using an AJAX-powered interface or chosen from a nested list of existing tags, depending on configuration. This allows for flexible and consistent tagging within Joomla.
